table.name: Person_Session
table.description: An active session of a user connected to the application

column.name: session_id
column.descr: An application-generated unique session ID

column.name: person_id
column.descr: The ID of the person that owns the session

column.name: org_id
column.descr: The organization (if any) from where session is being used

column.name: remote_host
column.descr: Remote host information that should be stored for security purposes

column.name: remote_addr
column.descr: Remote address information that should be kept for security purposes

column.name: first_access
column.descr: The first known time the session was access/used

column.name: last_access
column.descr: The last known time the session was accessed/used

table.name: PersonSession_Activity
table.description: All the activities undertaken by a user during a session

column.name: session_id
column.descr: The session ID for the activity

column.name: activity_type
column.descr: The type of activity undertaken

column.name: activity_stamp
column.descr: The date/time the activity was undertaken

column.name: action_type
column.descr: The type of action undertaken

column.name: action_scope
column.descr: The general scope of the change (for showing a menu, etc) - like person, org, etc.

column.name: action_key
column.descr: The key for the record/thing that was the focus of the activity

column.name: detail_level
column.descr: The level of detail (zero is highest level - for viewing/sorting purposes where user may only want to see 'high-level' activities)

column.name: activity_data
column.descr: Any activity-specific data (to show to end user)

table.name: PersonSession_View_Count
table.description: Count of all the activities undertaken by a user during a session

column.name: session_id
column.descr: The session ID for the activity

column.name: view_init
column.descr: The date/time this record was first viewed

column.name: view_latest
column.descr: The date/time this record was most recently viewed

column.name: view_scope
column.descr: This can be person, org, invoice, etc

column.name: view_key
column.descr: The key for the record/thing that was the focus of the activity

column.name: view_count
column.descr: The number of times this same view_scope and view_key was viewed in this session

column.name: view_caption
column.descr: The caption to show to the user for this view-type

column.name: view_arl
column.descr: The arl to use for the user for this view-type
